hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Ata' that Ibn 'Abbas said to Zaid bin Arqam:"Do you not know that the Prophet was given a piece of game meant when he was in Ihram and he did not accept it?" He said: "Yes

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا لاَ يَجُوزُ لِلْمُحْرِمِ أَكْلُهُ مِنَ الصَّيْدِ .
chapter.eng-name: What Game The Muhrim Is Not Permitted To Eat

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Abbas said:"Zaid bin Arqam came and Ibn Abbas said to him, reminding him: "What did you tell me about the game meat that was given to the Messenger of Allah when he was in Ihram?" He said: "Yes, a man gave him a piece of game meat but he returned it and said: 'We cannot eat it, we are in Ihram

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا لاَ يَجُوزُ لِلْمُحْرِمِ أَكْلُهُ مِنَ الصَّيْدِ .
chapter.eng-name: What Game The Muhrim Is Not Permitted To Eat
